title: DOMESTIC AND RESIDENTIAL ELECTRICAL INSTALLATION
fullText:
The installation requirements, for battery types that are categorized as fire hazard level 2 in Table 3.1, installed in a domestic or residential electrical installation, are as follows:
(a) Materials and installation methods that minimize the spread of fire shall be selected and applied.
(b) The battery system or BESS shall not be installed under a residential or domestic building containing habitable rooms.
